member.summary: Gets the preferred path to store the resource at if a specific file name is required.

member.name: T:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AssetRedirection.AssetLoadedHandlerBase`1
member.summary: Base implementation of resource redirect handler that takes care of the plumming for a resource redirector that is interested in either updating or dumping redirected resources.
member.typeparam: The type of asset being redirected.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AssetRedirection.AssetLoadedHandlerBase`1.#ctor
member.summary: Constructs the resource redirection handler.

member.name: P:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AssetRedirection.AssetLoadedHandlerBase`1.IsDumpingEnabled
member.summary: Gets a bool indicating if resource dumping is enabled in the Auto Translator.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AssetRedirection.AssetLoadedHandlerBase`1.ReplaceOrUpdateAsset(System.String,`0@,XUnity.ResourceRedirector.IAssetOrResourceLoadedContext)
member.summary: Method invoked when an asset should be updated or replaced.
member.param: This is the modification path calculated in the CalculateModificationFilePath method.
The asset to be updated or replaced.
This is the context containing all relevant information for the resource redirection event.
member.returns: A bool indicating if the event should be considered handled.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AssetRedirection.AssetLoadedHandlerBase`1.DumpAsset(System.String,`0,XUnity.ResourceRedirector.IAssetOrResourceLoadedContext)
member.summary: Method invoked when an asset should be dumped.
member.param: This is the modification path calculated in the CalculateModificationFilePath method.
The asset to be updated or replaced.
This is the context containing all relevant information for the resource redirection event.
member.returns: A bool indicating if the event should be considered handled.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AssetRedirection.AssetLoadedHandlerBase`1.CalculateModificationFilePath(`0,XUnity.ResourceRedirector.IAssetOrResourceLoadedContext)
member.summary: Method invoked when a new resource event is fired to calculate a unique path for the resource.
member.param: The asset to be updated or replaced.
This is the context containing all relevant information for the resource redirection event.
member.returns: A string uniquely representing a path for the redirected resource.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AssetRedirection.AssetLoadedHandlerBase`1.ShouldHandleAsset(`0,XUnity.ResourceRedirector.IAssetOrResourceLoadedContext)
member.summary: Method to be invoked to indicate if the asset should be handled or not.
member.param: The asset to be updated or replaced.
This is the context containing all relevant information for the resource redirection event.
member.returns: A bool indicating if the asset should be handled.

member.summary: Resource redirection state

member.summary: This is a hash set that contains all Text components that is currently being worked on by the translation plugin.

member.summary: Texts currently being scheduled for translation by 'immediate' components.

member.summary: Initialized the plugin.

member.summary: Loads the translations found in Translation.{lang}.txt

member.summary: Sets the text of a UI text, while ensuring this will not fire a text changed event.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AutoTranslationPlugin.WaitForTextStablization(System.Object,System.Single,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Action{System.String},System.Action)
member.summary: Utility method that allows me to wait to call an action, until the text has stopped changing. This is important for 'story' mode text, which 'scrolls' into place slowly.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.AutoTranslationPlugin.WaitForTextStablization(XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.UntranslatedText,System.Single,System.Action,System.Action)
member.summary: Utility method that allows waiating to call an action, until the text has stopped changing. This is important for 'story' mode text, which 'scrolls' into place slowly. This version is for global text, where the component cannot tell us if the text has changed itself.

member.summary:
Called during initialization. Use this to initialize plugin or throw exception if impossible.
Must set the ExecutablePath and optionally the Arguments property.

member.summary: Disposes the endpoint and kills the external process.

member.name: P:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.InternalTranslationResult.IsCompleted
member.summary: Gets a bool indicating if the translation is completed through either failure or success.

member.name: P:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.InternalTranslationResult.TranslatedText
member.summary: Gets the translated text if the translation succeeded.

member.name: P:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.InternalTranslationResult.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Gets the error message if the translation failed.

member.name: P:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.InternalTranslationResult.HasError
member.summary: Gets a bool indicating if the translation resulted in an error.

member.summary: Current of IEnumerator interface.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.InternalTranslationResult.MoveNext
member.summary: MoveNext of IEnumerator interface.
member.returns: Returns true if the translation has not completed.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.InternalTranslationResult.Reset
member.summary: Reset of IEnumerator interface.

member.name: T:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.IPluginEnvironment
member.summary:
Interface representing the environment in which the plugin runs.
This interface is not meant to be used by a translator.

member.summary: Gets the path the plugin is located at.

member.name: P:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.IPluginEnvironment.TranslationPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path representing the root of the translations.

member.name: P:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.IPluginEnvironment.ConfigPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path representing the config directory.

member.summary: Gets the preferences file.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.IPluginEnvironment.SaveConfig
member.summary: Saves the preferences file.

member.name: T:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.ITranslator
member.summary: Public API Surface for the Auto Translator Plugin.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.ITranslator.TranslateAsync(System.String,System.Action{XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.TranslationResult})
member.summary: Queries the plugin to provide a translated text for the untranslated text. If the translation cannot be found in the cache, it will make a request to the translator selected by the user.
member.param: The untranslated text to provide a translation for.
Callback to completion of the translation.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.ITranslator.TryTranslate(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Queries the plugin to provide a translated text for the untranslated text. If the translation cannot be found in the cache, the method returns false and returns null as the untranslated text.
member.param: The untranslated text to provide a translation for.

member.name: T:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.PluginLoader
member.summary:
PluginLoader class used to load the plugin during startup.
This is not meant to be used by Translators plugins!

member.summary: Loads the plugin with the specified environment.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.PluginLoader.Load
member.summary: Loads the plugin with default environment.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.PluginLoader.LoadThroughBootstrapper
member.summary: Loads the plugin in a delayed fashion.

member.name: T:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.Properties.Resources.StaticTranslations
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to 【アイシャドウ】カラー=[Eye Shadow] Color 【アクセサリ(スロット０１)】カラー=[Accessory 01] Color 【アクセサリ(スロット０１)】ツヤの色=[Accessory 01] Shine Color 【アクセサリ(スロット０２)】カラー=[Accessory 02] Color 【アクセサリ(スロット０２)】ツヤの色=[Accessory 02] Shine Color 【アクセサリ(スロット０３)】カラー=[Accessory 03] Color 【アクセサリ(スロット０３)】ツヤの色=[Accessory 03] Shine Color 【アクセサリ(スロット０４)】カラー=[Accessory 04] Color 【アクセサリ(スロット０４)】ツヤの色=[Accessory 04] Shine Color 【アクセサリ(スロット０５)】カラー=[Accessory 05] Color 【アクセサリ(スロット０５)】ツヤの色=[Accessory 05] Shine Color 【アクセサリ(スロット０６)】カラー=[Accessory 06] C [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: T:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.Shim.CustomYieldInstructionShim
member.summary: Shim for CustomYieldInstruction because it is not supported before version 5.3 of Unity.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.Shim.CustomYieldInstructionShim.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.Shim.CustomYieldInstructionShim.MoveNext
member.summary: Checks if the yield instruction needs to keep waiting.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.Shim.CustomYieldInstructionShim.Reset
member.summary: Does nothing.

member.name: P:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.Shim.CustomYieldInstructionShim.Current
member.summary: Gets a null object, specifying to Unity that it must wait a single frame before calling MoveNext again.

member.name: P:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.Shim.CustomYieldInstructionShim.keepWaiting
member.summary: Gets a bool indicating if the yield instruction needs to keep waiting.

member.name: P:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.Shim.CustomYieldInstructionShim.InGameTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets a timeout in in-game seconds.

member.name: P:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.Shim.CustomYieldInstructionShim.IsTimedOut
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool indicating if the CustomYieldOperation timed out.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.Shim.CustomYieldInstructionShim.GetSupportedEnumerator
member.summary: Gets an enumerator that can be iterated through in a co-routine and will work in even ancient versions of Unity.

member.name: T:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.SimpleTextTranslationCache
member.summary: This is a simplfied version of the text cache this plugin uses to store translations.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.SimpleTextTranslationCache.#ctor(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a translation cache and loads the translations in the specified file.
member.param: This is the file containing the translations to be loaded.
This is a bool indicating if the translations in the file specified should be loaded if possible.

member.name: P:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.SimpleTextTranslationCache.LoadedFile
member.summary: Gets the file that was used to initialize the SimpleTextTranslationCache.

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.SimpleTextTranslationCache.AddTranslationToCache(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a translation to the cache and writes it to the specified file (with a small delay, on a seperate thread).

member.name: M:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.SimpleTextTranslationCache.TryGetTranslation(System.String,System.Boolean,System.String@)
member.summary: Attempts to resolve a translation for the specified string.

member.summary: All the translations are stored in this dictionary.

member.name: F:XUnity.AutoTranslator.Plugin.Core.TextTranslationCache._writeToFileSync
member.summary: These are the new translations that has not yet been persisted to the file system.

member.summary: Remove diacritics (accents) from a string (for example ć -> c)

member.summary: Safe version of normalize that doesn't crash on invalid code points in string. Instead the points are replaced with question marks.
